item.title: Anime Suggestions
item.description: <!DOCTYPE html> Anime Recs Rohan's Anime Recommendations First request will take a bit longer (~10s) as Lambda warms up. Consecutive requests should be near instantaneous. Anime name: Number of suggestions (max 10): Embedding Method*: NCF LLM Submit *Embedding method determines the machine learning approach used to generate similar anime. NCF (Neural collaborative filtering) uses the ratings of other anime watchers from a popular anime ranking website. LLM (Large Language Model) uses the text similarity of the anime synopsis.
